Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE FERRITIN Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit
VALIDATE® FERRITIN Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE FERRITIN Calibration Verification/Linearity Test Kit for quantitative assessment of ferritin linearity and calibration verification on automated analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use in quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification and verification of reportable range for ferritin on automated instrument systems
